definition.text: Most files within the Superalgos folder are subject to be modified and contributed to the project! That includes code, images, documentation, etc.

translations.text: La maggior parte dei file nella cartella Superalgos possono essere modificati per contribuire al progetto! Questo include codici, immagini, docs, ecc.

paragraphs.text: These folders are exempt from being contributed: My-Workspaces, Data-Storage, and Log-Files.

translations.text: Queste cartelle non prevedono condivisione: My-Workspaces, Data-Storage, e Log-Files.

paragraphs.text: Do not use the Superalgos folder to store personal stuff or files that are not meant to be part of the Superalgos software! Anything that you include in the Superalgos folder (save for the noted exempted folders) is subject to be committed as a change, sent to your fork on GitHub.com, and included in a Pull Request, both publicly accessible!

translations.text: Non usare la cartella Superalgos per salvare file privati o che non sono parte del software! Qualsiasi cosa includi nelle cartelle, ad eccezione di quelle elencate sopra, viene eventualmente inviato al tuo fork su GitHub.com e incluso in una Pull Request, diventando visibile al pubblico!
